abstract: The lawyer representing a man claiming to own a substantial stake in Facebook withdrew from the case on Tuesday, just a day after he defended his client in an interview.
snippet: The lawyer representing a man claiming to own a substantial stake in Facebook withdrew from the case on Tuesday, just a day after he defended his client in an interview.
lead_paragraph: The lawyer representing a man claiming to own a substantial stake in Facebook withdrew from the case on Tuesday, just a day after he defended his client in an interview with The New York Times.

headline.main: Lawyer Withdraws From Case by Man Claiming Facebook Ownership

byline.original: By Peter Lattman and Andrew Ross Sorkin
